title: Group portrait of woman and three men wearing military uniforms, including hats inscribed "509 Pittsburgh, PA", "County Commander", and "County Chaplain", and jackets with "Pittsburgh Penna." embroidered on shoulder, including one on right holding large floral arrangement with ribbon that reads "American Legion" and "County Committee", gathered around male bust, in interior with light colored walls, plaque on left that reads "American Legion", and plaque on right that reads "Forty Ninth... Pennsylvania Volunteer Infantry One Hundred Tenth Regiment Volunteer Infantry"
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
